name: Hover Bovver: US-Canadian Edition (C64)
description:
Hover Bovver: US-Canadian Edition  (C64)

Calling all llamas.. Made by fans for fans... An absolutely free special edition of the classic game of the classic game now taking place somewhere in North American in a neighborhood... possibly near you. 

Nothing like the scent of fresh grass in the winter. eh? Hoser? (Feb. 2022)
